translation: Hear again My supreme word, most secret of all; for you are dearly beloved of Me, I will tell you what is good.
commentary: 18.64 Sarvaguhyatam the most secret of all? Bhuyah again? hear hear? May My? Param supreme? Vachah word? Ishtah beloved? Asi (thou) art? Me of Me? Strong dearly? It is thus? Then therefore? I will speak (I) will speak? And thy? Hitam what is good.Commentary Now listen once more with rapt attention to My words. Thou art very dear to Me. Thou art a sincere aspirant. Therefore I am telling thee this most mysterious
